thread.title: Mauro Mesiano
thread.title_full: www.lanieri.com recensione scritta da Mauro Mesiano

author: Mauro Mesiano
title: Mauro Mesiano
text: Great experience with Lanieri, in pret a misurè in atelier was a fantastic experience. If you want you can use my cod. MAURO_MESIANO to have a discount of 100€ by online dress configurator. It's a great opportunity!! When you will go at the payment step insert the cod promo to use and pay less your dreamer dress ;)
